meanings.definition: A person or company that transports packages or documents from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The courier delivered the package to my doorstep.
meanings.sent2: I always use a courier service to send important documents.
meanings.sent3: The courier accidentally delivered the package to the wrong address, causing a mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements made her seem like a courier of good news.
meanings.sent5: The courier's uniform and bag made him easily recognizable in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To send or transport something by courier.
meanings.sent1: I will courier the documents to the client tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She decided to courier the package instead of using regular mail.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would courier a pizza to his friend across the country.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory couriers hope to all the fans.
meanings.sent5: The urgent message was couriered to the headquarters for immediate action.
